message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the product at a price of $13,000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value.

I appreciate your time and consideration, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000 for the product. I believe it's a fair price considering its value, and I'm willing to make a serious offer on it.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I can't go lower than $11,500. This product holds significant value, and I'm confident it will benefit you greatly.

I appreciate your understanding, Alice. I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make sure I'm getting a good deal.
